ehi samapthi ulele gaurawaniya pradhana aaradhithaya lesa sahabhagi wuye janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha wima wisheshathwayak wiya.wasara 2018 podu rajya mandaliya krida ulele sathkarakathwaya thiranaya karana chanda wimasumata aprikanu kalapaye ratawala chanda 19k ooshaniya kalapaye ratawala chanda 13k, karibiyan dupath chanda 15k, yuropa ratawala chanda 10k ha amerikanu kalapaye ratawala chanda 6k athulathya.niyojithayan haththaek denagen adakata wada chanda laba ganna ratata 2018 podu rajya mandalayiya krida ulele sathkarakathwaya himiwanu atha.shri lankawa danata athkaragena athi suwisheshi jayagrahana thawa thawath uddipanaya kirimata 2018 podu rajya mandaliya krida ulela iwahalwana bawa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha pasugiya da prakasha kaleya.
